descriptions.description: Virtual Network Computing (VNC) is a remote display system which allows you to view and interact with a virtual desktop environment that is running on another computer on the network. TigerVNC is a high-speed version of VNC. It bases on RealVNC 4 and X.org code and includes features from the TightVNC and TurboVNC projects. This includes accelerated JPEG compression.

set.commands: PACKAGE_NAME=tigervnc PACKAGE_VERSION=1.3.0 oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.bz2 oegimport cmake-2.8.11.2 oegimport gettext-0.18.3 oegimport libiconv-1.14 oegimport gnutls-3.2.2 oegimport gmp-5.1.2 oegimport readline-6.2 oegimport nettle-2.7.1 oegimport zlib-1.2.8 oegimport libtasn1-3.3 oegimport p11-kit-0.19.2 #oegimport libiconv-1.14 #oegimport gettext-0.18.3 #oegimport libtasn1-3.3 oegimport libffi-3.0.13 oegimport fltk-1.3.2 oegimport libgcrypt-1.5.3 oegimport libgpg-error-1.12 #oegimport libiconv-1.14 #oegimport gettext-0.18.3 oegimport libjpeg-turbo-1.3.0 #configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} #cmake -G "MSYS Makefiles" #make cmake -G "MSYS Makefiles" -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} make make install DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} #cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" cd /open-egovernment-install/msys/open-egovernment-install/ mkdir bin mv *.exe *.dll bin/ oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
